text: "Moirang Ningthourol Lambuba" () is a historical document (puya), which served as the court chronicle of the rulers of the kingdom in Ancient Moirang. It records the genealogy of the kings of the Moirang dynasty.Moirang Ningthourol Moirang and Ebuthou Thangjing Part 6 The chronicle also slightly mentioned about the history of the Zeliangrong people. ==Bibliography== * Moirang Ningthourol Lambuba : Bhogeshwar, Oinam : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive * https://indcat.inflibnet.ac.in/index.php/thesesrequest?id=266574 ==References== Category:Puya Category:Ancient India
title: Moirang Ningthourol Lambuba
